website_summaries.verdict: The box's colorful graphics and large size make it fun for children to open every window.
pros: Each window contains a verse from a Christmas poem
cons: Pieces of chocolate may be missing or out-of-place

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 3 year old son and it was a total disappointment. Immediately I noticed none of the chocolates were in any of the spots. Day 3 I noticed after reaching down to the bottom of the box where all the chocolate pieces were, that they were either discolored (old? previously melted?) or broken. I tried a piece that wasn't discolored, I didn't expect fancy expensive chocolate but it tasted awful. It went into the garbage. Will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: tiffanyc29

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a disappointment. I read the reviews and some were not good. I was hoping they were wrong, but the candy has fallen to the bottom. There is no surprise chocolate from the middle to the top, unless you shake it upside down. I had purchased one two years ago that did not do this. I will search for a better one next year.
customer_reviews.author: Lily J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible experience! My boy opened Day 1 today and there was no chocolate. We peeked ahead and all of the chocolate was either melted into the plastic or in broken bits at the bottom of the box. Very disappointing for his 1st advent calendar.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cotter

customer_reviews.title: Just messy.
customer_reviews.text: This probably is more to do with transit then anything else. But all the chocolates were at the bottom, maybe two were in their respective day slots, some of them were already open or partially pushed. There was plastic, so am sure it was all doing with the shipping rush. Chocolate was ok in taste but it was already a bit greying probably from bumping into each other. This was my fault, probably an item you are better served buying in store.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ward

customer_reviews.title: We could not do the countdown correctly
customer_reviews.text: When our six orders arrived, there was sound coming from the boxes because none of the chocolates stayed in place, so we had to open all the windows, dump out the chocolates, and put them back in... after doing this twice, I ended up finding them at Walgreens for 1.50 and bought them there, so we tore these open and stuck the chocolate in a dish.
customer_reviews.author: MommyofFive

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I discovered this before my granddaughters opened them on ...
customer_reviews.text: When the calendars arrived, all the chocolates were at the bottom of the box. When the doors on the calendars were opened, there was nothing there. I slit open the bottom, replaced all the chocolates, and taped it up. As soon as I went to hang it you could hear all the chocolates sliding out of their slots and falling to the bottom of the box again. I'm so glad I discovered this before my granddaughters opened them on December 1. Totally crappy calendar. I threw them out and bought locally.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Markey

customer_reviews.title: It was alright
customer_reviews.text: This was ok....I got my money’s worth I should have just spent a little bit more for better quality. All the chocolate was all mixed around missing slots so I had to shake it from the bottom to find them. The chocolate was good it served its purpose my daughter was happy. But I definitely didn’t like that the numbers weren’t in order the numbers/dates were all over...missed some days cause the numbers blended with the pictures very well lol
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you would like pleasant experience
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea of this advent calendar with my 3 year old because of the story each night. Unfortunately I read the reviews about the chocolate falling and figured they were from a few years ago—they had to have fixed the issue right? WRONG. All of the chocolate was at the bottom of the calendar. And after attempting to fix the issue twice and taping, etc. I gave up. Thank god someone else got us a calendar that was functional. I would advise the next person not do as I did and for the manufacturers to finally fix the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Chocolates fell out of places
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting chocolates and we liked reading part of the Night Before Christmas each day. Unfortunately a lot of the chocolates fell out of their spot behind each door and fell to the bottom. my son was disappointed when we opened empty spots and had to fish the pieces out from the bottom. Keep this laying flat if you want to avoid the chocolate pieces falling down.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Not happy. Will make my own advent next year
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product for several years, but this year, the chocolates fell out of their slots when I hung them up. It was as if the box was too loose for the inside tray. I bought two calendars and they both did this. I had to open the boxes and re-set 24 tiny chololates into their respective toy "model" slot. As I kept the calendars on the wall out of the reach of curious little hands, I had to do this THREE TIMES EACH. I have kids that would notice this difference if the chocolate didn't match the picture behind the window. Not happy. Will make my own advent next year.
customer_reviews.author: Mamahof

customer_reviews.title: Better to buy these in the store
customer_reviews.text: Arrived all beat/shooken up. The pieces weren't in their place. They all had fallen to the bottom. Luckily my 3 yr just shook it around until a piece appeared in the number he opened for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Justin and Jess

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate is made from a very soft chocolate. Even at 76 in our house the chocolate had melted. But it was melted to begin with. It showed up with what appeared to be no chocolate in it! Imagine how strange to open day 1, 2, 3....and they are all empty! It was in a heap at the bottom. I called the Vermont chocolate company directly and they were AWESOME! They shipped one immediately at no cost. The only reason I gave any stars was for their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ohlemeier

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know I could be disappointed in an advent calendar. Whoever made this thing maybe thought they tried. I want to give them that. But they didn’t. I could hear the chocolates (I call them chocolates because it’s Christmas) rattling around and I knew that they couldn’t possibly be stationed dutifully behind each unopened door but I believed. Because it’s christmas. Unfortunately, Santa isn’t real, the ice caps are melting, and all of the “chocolate” was at the bottom of a cheap cardboard box. Merry Christmas everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Watson jr

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Just right. I bought 2 for my daughters and they loved them. None of the chocolates fell to the bottom like others reported, and the chocolate looked fresh. It could have been a bit more inexpensive, but the stores around here were sold out.
customer_reviews.author: LadyChroe

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This product came in a box which was good, but the packages were bent and all th chocolate inside that where suppose to be in the squares fell to the bottom of calander. I would never buy this product again. It defeats the whole purpose of an adven calander if the chocolates are not even in the squares to be opened.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Longmore

customer_reviews.title: Horrible waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Came folded and broken candies out of place rattling around how wonderful for a 3 year old to open a packed with a crumpled Advent calendar. Came in a big I'm opened mailing box so no excuse for it to be damaged like this. Very disappointed someone thought it was acceptable to package and mail something in poor condition
customer_reviews.author: Alaina

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one for each of my kids. Not only are the flaps unusually difficult to open each day; both calendars are missing chocolates! The kids love the countdown to Christmas but half of the days they open only to find an empty compartment. Disappointed. Do not buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Jenergize

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made. The chocolates all migrated to different ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. The chocolates all migrated to different spots so you open a day and no chocolate but other days there might be a bunch in one spot. I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 windows had a chocolate behind them
customer_reviews.text: We liked the picture on the package with the 24 windows that my granddaughter chose and the chocolate tasted okay. The BIG problem was only 2 windows out of 24 had a chocolate behind them. The other 22 were in a heap at the bottom which completely defeated the purpose of an Advent calendar. So disappointing! I will NOT buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Briana's Grandma

customer_reviews.title: I prefer dark chocolate but it's still quality
customer_reviews.text: I prefer dark chocolate but it's still quality, the art and the poem are endearing. For the price range it far exceedes what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compare options. Cute story
customer_reviews.text: Little one loved the story.. didn't care for chocolate. I seen the same product at walgreens for 1.49. Also all the chocolate fell to the bottom of the box. Not one piece of chocolate was in its place.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: don't buy--not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: this item arrived damaged. the choc candies had fallen to the bottom of the box. then it says you cannot return them. i have purchased this type of calendar before. some I have paid only a $1 for. this item is overpriced and not reliable. very disappointed in it.
customer_reviews.author: Grammi

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate doesn't stay in windows.
customer_reviews.text: While this is cute and my daughter loves finding the window and reading the story we don't really like finding the chocolate. At some point all of the chocolate fell out of the windows. Whenever we open a door the place for chocolate is empty so we have to shake one out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: P and J

customer_reviews.text: did what it bought for but the chocolate was all moved inside the container. Had to open the bottom to get at it
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: A family tradition!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally leave reviews on items.. however, i have been purchasing these advent calendars for my grandparents for the past 3 years and it has become my favorite tradition. The chocolates are amazing and the little sayings inside bring a smile to my grandmothers face! I will continue to purchase these and recommend them to friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Caylin

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: I loved these as a kid. Though the chocolate was all over the place inside so when my daughter opened up a day there’d be no chocolate cause it was at the bottom of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Skylar

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend. Arrived damaged. No refund.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these and they both arrived damaged. The candy had all fallen out of the individual compartments and was down in the bottom of the package. And I can't return them so it was a total waste of money. Definitely will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Tauna

customer_reviews.title: Advent Calendar
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced. I'm house bound this year. Could not take advantage of supermarket price.
customer_reviews.author: hrh48

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Treat
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons love these Christmas calendars and look forward to the chocolate each day.
customer_reviews.author: A. E. Iou

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Kids love the candy and having the opportunity of opening one window each day
customer_reviews.author: William E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Buy from Vermont Christmas direct website instead and NOT thru amazon!
customer_reviews.text: The calendar sounds like a box of legos when you pick it up. The chocolates are crunched up and have all fallen to the bottom. However, if you contact Vermont Christmas directly, they will replace the defective product. Next time I will order from this company directly and NOT from amazon. They are ruining the calendars in transit.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline A. Lexa

customer_reviews.title: Chocolates were very small and tasted weird.
customer_reviews.text: Chocolates were very small and tasted weird. Each one tasted different and when I would try to open each spot, it ripped very easily and was messy. When opened sometimes the chocolates wern't there and I found out they fell into another compartment or were all at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Flo Motion

customer_reviews.title: Great advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: My husband said I did this for a countdown to Christmas. We really enjoyed reading the poem together and sharing the chocolate on each day.
customer_reviews.author: Sarina Wilburn

customer_reviews.title: Every one loves advent calendars
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids liked them Be nice to have a dark chocolate option
customer_reviews.author: Norm

customer_reviews.title: and a couple of them were fine, but a few of them had the candy ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 6 of these, and a couple of them were fine, but a few of them had the candy all broken away and just flying loose in the box. Therefore, there was no way you could go day by day and get one candy at a time. The candy was all in the bottom... was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Becky A.

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent in manufacturing process
customer_reviews.text: Bought two calendars for my grandchildren. One calendar was fine, the other one had the chocolates just running around in the back of the cardboard front. There were no complaints from the children about the taste. The graphics were colorful and just as depicted. I would have given a much higher grade if both had been manufactured well.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki M Duncan

customer_reviews.title: 24 Days of treats
customer_reviews.text: Kiddos love to open each day leading up to Santa”s big arrival!
customer_reviews.author: skelly

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: Sad just sad. My kids were very disappointed. All of the chocolates fell to the bottom. They had to open up all the doors to fix it. What’s the point???
customer_reviews.author: originalgreek

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Nope. All the melted old chocolate was at the bottom of the box so when you opened a day it was empty. Had to rip open the display to get out the candy only to trash it because it was gross.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It was a perfect way to bring in the holiday season!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $7
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy on how I received this calendar. When I picked it up I heard the chocolates shake inside and indeed when I opened the 1st box there was no chocolate piece in it. I opened the box to see if I could just reput the pieces in place but then I found the chocolates mushed together in one area... I ordered it online because it was a nice design but it is clearly not worth paying $7 for.
customer_reviews.author: E.cl.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: They tasted good but the chocolates pop out very easily and end up at the bottom inside the container
customer_reviews.author: Mamawolf0425

customer_reviews.title: Great holiday addition!
customer_reviews.text: I love advent calendars and this one lived up the expectations. It really brought my family together over the holiday season as we read each part of the poem together. The chocolate was typical advent calendar variety and tasted very nostalgic and lovely. Overall, I am very pleased with my purchase and will buy one again next year!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa L.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy...cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: All of the chocolates were in the bottom of the product. Not fun for a kid to open with empty windows. Wont buy again, dont recommend, overpriced
customer_reviews.author: cab100263

customer_reviews.title: Grate
customer_reviews.text: Ty they were.grate and all the candy was in it
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Blay

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: None of the chocolate was in the tray, I had to take it apart and put them all in place for my kids to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Myndy Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Get these types every year for GrandLoves. This year was good quality, price and delivered in time
customer_reviews.author: Richard and Katherine Martin

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 calendars, and while the packaging was fine, the inside was not. All the chocolate had become dislodged and was sliding around inside the container. None of them was in place behind the flap.
customer_reviews.author: Taka

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!! every single chocolate fell out of its holder !! Imagine a child’s disappointment when they open the flap to get a chocolate and nothing is there!! They all fell to the bottom ! TOTAL GARBAGE!!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Some of the chocolates were shifted but it's a nice piece
customer_reviews.author: saverio c.

customer_reviews.title: They’re fun
customer_reviews.text: I love having these calendars, I thought they were a little more expensive than in the past. The chocolate is so so but, my kid loved it until the darn dog ate days 7 thru 24!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie J.

customer_reviews.title: all The chocolate fell to the bottom of the box.
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate is not excellent but that’s to be expected from the price. The larger issue is that none of the chocolate is in its place so when you open the box for the day, the chocolate is not actually there because it fell to the bottom of the box. We bought two and both have this issue.
customer_reviews.author: BiggsWagner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed when my kids were able to open the days all of the chocolates have shifted all over the board so they would either open a number with no chocolate or 3 days worth. Whether it was Amazon’s shipping the product or how the product is made..not pleased with the product experience
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Dupuis

customer_reviews.title: Advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: Packaging needs work. They candy slides around to much,so that when we opened a day some of them were empty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Chocolates all are rattling around in box. Not under the flapes like suppose to be.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Pieces mixed up - unusable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two as gifts for my two kids - the one came in defective - air bubble under cardboard and chocolate pieces all mixed up and some not in any place. Needed it for today so no time for a return. Luckily I had an extra one from my son’s school. I threw out the defective one- waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't cost too much.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the granularity of the chocolate. The design of the calendar was okay. It didn't cost much so I'm okay with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis P.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: None of the candy stayed in their spot My daughter open the windows to an empty hole
customer_reviews.author: gina lacey

customer_reviews.title: They come fast and intact every year
customer_reviews.text: I buy these every year for my kids ever since they were little toddlers and now they are tween and teen, they always arrive intact and fast! It’s s tradition
customer_reviews.author: Kali-Ann

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced-looks elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: This was s waste of money. After my purchase, I found better quality ones for $1.99 at Five Below and the local grocery store. I regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Magan

customer_reviews.title: Bad design. Loose pieces everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Broken pieces and 80% were loose and moving around. Not even on there correct spaces. So you would open a window and there wouldn't be any chocolate. Bad design
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves these, even though Christmas is nowhere ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these, even though Christmas is nowhere in sight. She loves opening a new window (with chocolate) each day.
customer_reviews.author: TheJSW

customer_reviews.title: All ages with a treat each day.
customer_reviews.text: Delicious chocolates that are a perfect treat for the countdown.
customer_reviews.author: Pandora

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: It was okay. Chocolates had all fallen out if their places by the time it arrived and chocolates. There were sweet yet old fashioned poems inside each one I had to translate to my 6 yo. Chocolates were okay.
customer_reviews.author: bianca

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 0 stars, I would. When it came, all the chocolate pieces had fallen to the bottom. I ended up opening it from the bottom, putting all the pieces back, and then trying to glue the cardboard to the inner tray so they would stay put. It didn't work. It was way more hassle than it was worth. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When this product arrived all the chocolate was shook up and all,over the place. None of the pieces were in the right spots and when you opened the windows, you had to hunt for a piece. I would not buy this again. Definately not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Erik P

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product
customer_reviews.text: Shipping a real one from Germany can be pricey. This is a great calendar to get the kids started on and make great memories with.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Handle with care
customer_reviews.text: This order was for my Grandson and when I received my event calendar the chocolate squares were all loose and on the bottom of the event calendar box so I am disappointed with my perche.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Advent Calendar all chocolates popped out of place already
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty advent calendar with nice parts of the ‘Twas the Night Before Christmas story but all the chocolate pieces were popped out of their places and not in the windows when we received it. The sections weren’t glued down to hold them in place either.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hull

customer_reviews.title: Chocolates fell to the bottom
customer_reviews.text: I would have given fewer stars if I could have. Most of the chocolates had fallen to the bottom before I ever opened the package. Kind of a bummer for my son. Needless to say we just opened it and put the chocolates in a dish. That completely takes away from the point of the calendar, which is to count down to Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Mountaingirl

customer_reviews.title: The chocolate bars are not attached so some windows end up empty... most of them
customer_reviews.text: Most of the chocolate bars were scattered out of its place. Just wish it was easier on the parents (almost impossible) to put it in place
customer_reviews.author: Nickalaus W.

customer_reviews.title: Possible bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: This is a first for me. Haven’t even unwrapped the calendars but I can hear the chocolates inside moving all around. Could of gotten a bad batch but still my kids can’t open the doors and find a chocolate because they are all over the place in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: not very good
customer_reviews.text: chocolates were lose inside the box so my kids would open some squares and there would be no chocolate inside
customer_reviews.author: Maurizio Mauro

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for My kids, but when they began to open each day there was no chocolate behind each door. Out of 24 days, only 2 squares had chocolate behind the dates. The rest had fallen out and were all broken at the bottom of box. I won’t be ordering these again.
customer_reviews.author: Hollen B

customer_reviews.title: Very cute for the price
customer_reviews.text: Sat on desk at work for students to open. Great item for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ma B

customer_reviews.title: Empty boxes
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate settled to the bottom of the calendar at some point during delivery and my children were disappointed to find empty windows in the advent calendar.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Chocolates fell to the bottom of the calendar :(
customer_reviews.text: Loved the picture, disliked the fact that all the chocolates were at the bottom of the box though..I had to open up the package and rearrange the chocolates, and now we have to be super careful with it which makes it a little less fun, I think.
customer_reviews.author: Genai

customer_reviews.title: Calendar
customer_reviews.text: The 4 year old loves the chocolate, story and knowing when Santa is coming!
customer_reviews.author: Homertw

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: This would be great if any of the chocolates where in place behind the doors when you open them. My kids get to open each day to find out the chocolate that’s supposed to be is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not order
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate inside the calendar was melted completely, made my daughter cry from disappointment. We brought it in right after it got delivered. It was not sitting outside, so must have melted earlier. Very upsetting!Don’t order this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: **Don’t purchase this product!**
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my kids and they opened the first two days on December 1st, because the came out looking and tasting disgusting. I decided to open the box, and was even further disappointed. It looks like the candy sat and melted and hardened several times before it was shipped to me.
customer_reviews.author: cory

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: When I received the item it sounded like the pieces of chocolate were moving inside. Fun surprise on December 1st to realize that the chocolates have all fallen to the bottom. So much for an advent calendar.
customer_reviews.author: C Sims

customer_reviews.title: Fun for young kids chocolate isn’t greet chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Fun and exciting for kids but chocolate is not great
customer_reviews.author: renee

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 of these for my grandchildren and the candy is at the bottom of the calendar. So when they go to open the first window, the candy will have to be retrieved from the bottom by cutting a hole!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A Pixler

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.. poor quality..
customer_reviews.text: Product came with all chocolates loose and sitting at the bottom of the box. Had to open it up, reset all the chocolates and glue plastic tray to the box.. Very poor design. Dollar store quality.👎
customer_reviews.author: Ximena

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy unless you want tears
customer_reviews.text: All the chocolates were at the bottom of the box which resulted in tears as we opened the first few doors ...had to take the whole thing apart to try and fix it which resulted in the whole thing tearing which resulted in more tears. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: M. Siegle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and fast
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, as advertised. Grand kids loved then. Very fast delivery. Gaandma was lax in waiting so long she could not find any in the stores--will take the easy route next year!
customer_reviews.author: Bookiejo

customer_reviews.title: chocolate taste bad....
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate in this calendar is old. It taste bad. Kids started eating them and both made mention it was not like last years one. I took a look at it today and see each chocolate has that bubble look when it gets old.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Heselmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Badly made, no returns
customer_reviews.text: All the chocolates came loose so every door was empty. It was poorly made, I had shake it to force a chocolate out the door. Didnt allow for a return.
customer_reviews.author: F Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Missing chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Christmas. He was disappointed to find that there was no chocolate in multiple unopened doors. I even looked thinking maybe they had slipped down during shipping and were in the bottom of the package but no luck.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Delicious chocolates in a cute calendar Christmas countdown!
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren look forward to this every year! They love finding the dates and eating the delicious chocolate surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann C.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and entertaining. Even as an adult.
customer_reviews.text: Delicious. My girlfriend and I always love these every year. Lots of fun for looking forward to Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Ross K

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate doesn’t stay in the day it all goes to the bottom and you have to dig it out every morning.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: All the chocolate fell to the bottom of the calendar and was stale
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chocolates fell to bottom
customer_reviews.text: Chocolates fell to bottom in 2 out of 3 calendars sadly. Taste fine, kids were happy.
customer_reviews.author: Brandee Kandle

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This was really bad the chocolates were all at the bottom whatever was supposed to be holding chocolates in place so that you got one in each box was apparently not there, it was an absolute waste of money😡
customer_reviews.author: Lilianflorida

customer_reviews.title: Great chocolate but frustrating.
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I had with this advent calendar was that the chocolate from other slots would fall out a lot and would be hard to get back to wear they belong. It was very very frustrating and I'm not sure if I'll be buying this again for next year. But the chocolates were probably the tastiest I've ever had from an advent calendar
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Probably not a faulty product, more like faulty shipping.
customer_reviews.text: All the candy fell out of their slots when it was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Damaged/chocolate not in slots
customer_reviews.text: I just received 4 advent calendars today and 2 of them were damaged. When I lifted them out of the box the chocolate was in no way in the little blocks the chocolate went all the way to the bottom of the calendar. Just sad
customer_reviews.author: Deanna D.

customer_reviews.title: Missing chocolates inside
customer_reviews.text: The item is missing chocolates in the boxes. My daughter has been disappointed twice with missing chocolates and we’re only on day 7 today and it doesn’t give me the option to return. Ridiculous! Not right.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette C.

product_meta.title: Santa's Here Chocolate Advent Calendar 2.65 oz (75 g)
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1Prepare for Christmas by opening a window each day during Advent. Upon opening each window, find a wonderful piece of gourmet milk chocolate. Also find a verse from Twas the Night Before Christmas. Each Advent calendar contains 2.6 ounces of chocolate and measures 10"x13 3/4".
feature_bullets: Each window opens revealing a piece of gourmet milk chocolate.
Also find a verse from "Twas the Night Before Christmas
Calendar contains 2.6 ounces of chocolate. All chocolate produced in Canada.
Vermont Christmas Company will replace items damaged in transit.
